placements.title: Audiologist Administrator
requirements: Candidates will require good communication skills (both telephone and face to face)
Commitment to supporting people with learning disabilities
Ability to work as part of a team

placements.description: We are a small and friendly team and you will work closely with the admin team, audiologists and the consultant in providing effective and timely care to children and young people.

placements.description: This is an exciting opportunity for an individual to experience a career in the NHS as an administrative assistant within the Community Paediatric Service at The Heathside Centre in Coxheath, Maidstone.

placements.description: As a Therapy Assistant you will support the speech and language therapists to ensure the smooth running of the service and safe, effective and efficient patient care. This may be through preparing resources for therapy sessions; preparing high and low tech communication aids, working directly with patients in one to one or group situations under the guidance of the speech and language therapists and helping with patient related admin tasks.
